problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD中,∠B=∠D,⊙O经过点A,C,D,与BC相交于点E,连AC,AE,若∠D=72°,则∠BAE为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the quadrilateral ABCD, ∠B = ∠D, ⊙O passes through points A, C, D, and BC intersects at point E, even AC, AE, if ∠D = N_0, then ∠BAE is ()
notes: 缺少定理:菱形对角线平分角
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是菱形,∠D=72°,∴∠ACB=\frac{1}{2}∠DCB=\frac{1}{2}(180°-∠D)=54°,∵四边形AECD是圆内接四边形,∴∠AEB=∠D=72°,∴∠BAE=180°-72°-72°=36°,故选:B．
